physDesc.p: Fragments 1-14 (in mm), (1) 34 x 64, (A) 2 lines, top left margins, (B) blank, (2) 59 x 59, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (3) 55 x 80, (A) 7 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (4) 49 x 23, (A) 10 lines, top (?) margin, (B) 1 line, left margin (?), (5) 55 x 21, (A) 4 lines, no margins (?), (B) blank, (6) 56 x 62, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 45 x 33, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 26 x 116, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 30 x 26, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 67 x 33, (A) 10 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (11) 60 x 60, (A) 8 lines, left bottom margins, (B) 3 lines, left bottom margin, (12) 100 x 59, (A) 7 lines, left top margins, (B) 6 lines, top margins , (13) 110 x 23, (A) 6 lines, top margin, (B) traces, (14) 95 x 26, (A) 12 lines, no margins, (B) blank
